definition: very unhappy, feelings of mental or physical pain
details:
adjective
- very unhappy
= synonyms: miserable
- troubled by pain or loss
= example: troubled by pain or loss
noun
- feelings of mental or physical pain
= synonyms: hurt
- psychological suffering
= synonyms: distress
- a state of acute pain
= synonyms: excruciation
- misery resulting from affliction
= synonyms: woe
